statements: SELECT * FROM health_records;
SELECT patient_name, encrypted_record FROM health_records WHERE access_type = 'patient';
SELECT record_id, patient_name FROM health_records WHERE access_type = 'provider' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT record_id, patient_name, access_type FROM health_records WHERE access_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT record_id, patient_name, access_type FROM health_records WHERE access_type = 'provider';
SELECT * FROM health_records ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT record_id, encrypted_record, access_key FROM health_records WHERE access_type = 'patient' ORDER BY record_id ASC;
SELECT record_id, blockchain_access_hash FROM health_records WHERE blockchain_access_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT record_id, patient_id FROM patient_records WHERE health_provider_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 456;
SELECT record_id, encrypted_data FROM patient_records ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE access_granted = true;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT record_id, encrypted_data FROM patient_records WHERE health_provider_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE access_granted = TRUE AND blockchain_access_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) FROM patient_records GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records pr JOIN access_control ac ON pr.record_id = ac.record_id WHERE ac.access_granted = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE record_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4bed';
SELECT patient_name, public_key FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT provider_name FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE provider_id = '2a8749bd-8cdd-4e0a-8cda-8764b7af6add';
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE patient_id = 'b01d6f3a-6cc8-4ace-9b6e-891d14f98b48' ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT health_data FROM HealthRecords WHERE record_id = 'ed15683c-44d5-4ea7-8263-30a2483c862a';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT provider_name FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE provider_id = 'f1a0dc5e-f458-4b84-872d-464e44cdfa20';
SELECT patient_name, public_key FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT provider_id, public_key FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE provider_name LIKE 'Dr.%';
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE patient_id = '86d9c0fa-3b0b-4838-abe8-9f2f7c1f0a6d' AND (health_data ->> 'blood_pressure')::numeric >= 120 ORDER BY (health_data ->> 'blood_pressure')::numeric DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE provider_type = 'Doctor';
SELECT * FROM AccessLogs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT block_id, hash, timestamp FROM Blockchain ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM HealthcareProviders ORDER BY provider_type DESC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM AccessLogs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT block_id, previous_block_id, hash FROM Blockchain WHERE hash LIKE '%abc%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM health_records;
SELECT health_record_id, patient_id, doctor_id, health_record_data, encryption_key FROM health_records;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address, patient_birthdate, patient_phone FROM patients;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, doctor_license_number, hospital_id FROM doctors;
SELECT log_id, health_record_id, accessed_by_id, access_timestamp, description FROM access_logs;
SELECT * FROM health_records;
SELECT health_record_id, patient_id, doctor_id FROM health_records WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE hospital_id = 6789 ORDER BY doctor_specialty ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address, patient_phone FROM patients WHERE patient_birthdate >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT health_record_id, block_id, block_data FROM blockchain_records WHERE block_hash = 'abcdef123456';
